siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz | Make AI Make Sense | Public speaking, workshops and hands-on Big Data & GenAI consulting.
siteMetadata.description: Helping teams and audiences make AI make sense.
siteMetadata.about:
Seasoned software engineer and team lead specializing in GenAI, search, and scalable systems. I build RAG applications, AI agents, and hybrid search solutions using Python, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frameworks.

As a consultant, I've delivered end-to-end GenAI projects for clients across industries. My background spans ad-tech, finance, and big data with deep expertise in Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, and LLM-powered applications.

Recent wins: Webby Award for "Human or Not" and Google AI Hackathon winner for "Tube Uni."

Available for GenAI consulting, partnerships, public speaking, and private workshops.

markdownRemark.excerpt: I’ll be speaking at Build Stuff in Vilnius, Lithuania this December. Looking forward to it! Building Advanced RAGs with Elasticsearch / OpenSearch RAG…
markdownRemark.html:
I’ll be speaking at Build Stuff in Vilnius, Lithuania this December. Looking forward to it!

Building Advanced RAGs with Elasticsearch / OpenSearch

RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) is built in three steps: understanding the query, executing a retrieval step, and generating a response. Each step has its own unique characteristics and challenges.

In this session, we’ll go through common pitfalls (and solutions!) for each step, and demonstrate how you can build an efficient RAG using Elasticsearch or OpenSearch.

What to expect

We’ll cover:

  • Query processing and intent understanding
  • Effective retrieval strategies
  • Response generation techniques
  • Real-world examples and practical patterns

The focus is on the practical stuff - the challenges you actually run into when building RAG systems in production, not just the happy path demos.

Details

When: December 3-5, 2025
Where: Vilnius, Lithuania
Conference: Built Stuff

If you’re interested in attending, there’s a 15% discount available.

frontmatter.title: Speaking at Build Stuff Vilnius 2025
frontmatter.description: I'll be speaking at Build Stuff in Vilnius, Lithuania on the 3rd of December 2025. Looking forward to it!
